entry.title: WIND WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 09:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: NE 65 km/h gust 77 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning then to 30 gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 60%
